effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
An attack that
may cause a burn.

An attack that
may cause a burn.

A fiery blast that scorches
all. May cause a burn.

Incinerates everything it
strikes. May cause a burn.

The foe is hit with
an intense flame.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

The foe is attacked
with an intense blast
of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

The foe is attacked
with an intense blast
of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

The foe is attacked
with an intense blast
of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

Un déluge de flammes ardentes submerge
l’ennemi. Peut aussi le brûler.

The target is attacked with an intense
blast of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the target with a burn.

The target is attacked with an intense
blast of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the target with a burn.

だいのじの　ほのおで
あいてを　やきつくす。
やけど　じょうたいに　することが　ある。

큰 대자의 불꽃으로
상대를 불태운다.
화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

Un déluge de flammes ardentes submerge
l’ennemi. Peut aussi le brûler.

Feuersbrunst, die das Ziel versengt und
ihm eventuell eine Verbrennung zufügt.

Llama intensa que chamusca y puede causar
quemaduras.

Investe il bersaglio con un’intensa fiammata
che fa terra bruciata. Può anche scottarlo.

The target is attacked with an intense
blast of all-consuming fire.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

大の字の　炎で
相手を　焼きつくす。
やけど状態に　することが　ある。

큰 대자의 불꽃으로
상대를 불태운다.
화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

用大字形狀的火焰燒盡對手。
有時會讓對手陷入灼傷狀態。

l’ennemi. Peut aussi le brûler.

all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target

大の字の　炎で
相手を　焼きつくす。
やけど状態に　することが　ある。

用大字形状的火焰烧尽对手。
有时会让对手陷入灼伤状态。
